abstract: One of Evercore Partners’s most senior deal makers, Eduardo G. Mestre, will give up his title as the firm’s head of investment banking in the United States after being appointed as a director at Comcast.
snippet: One of Evercore Partners’s most senior deal makers, Eduardo G. Mestre, will give up his title as the firm’s head of investment banking in the United States after being appointed as a director at Comcast.
lead_paragraph: One of Evercore Partners‘s most senior deal makers, Eduardo G. Mestre, has given up his title as the firm’s head of investment banking in the United States after being appointed as a member of Comcast‘s audit committee, the firm disclosed on Friday.

headline.main: Evercore’s Mestre Gives Up U.S. Investment Banking Head Title

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
